Hero.text_2: I'm Changwoo Lee, a Web developer.
Hero.text_3: I'm interested in overall web development using the JavaScript ecosystem and mobile development using Flutter.

Metadata.title: Woo3145 Blog
Metadata.description: Welcome to Woo3145's developer page. I'm Changwoo Lee, a web developer primarily working with TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Flutter.

Landing.skillDescription: also, I have a tendency to learn everything for development without being tied to a specific tech-stacks
